backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing the habit tracker backend with user profile management, habit CRUD operations, and check-in functionality, all gated behind access control/authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the habits data-fetching fix (in useQueries.ts) to test requirement REQ-1 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short descriptions for every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and behavior of each component, page, and hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind entry stylesheet defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the full design token set (colors, radius, chart, sidebar) in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the React tree into a #root div and loading the main.tsx entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root Layout route and two child routes: / (HabitsPage) and /summary (SummaryPage).
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps children with an authentication check via useInternetIdentity, showing a loading spinner, a login prompt with LoginButton, or the protected content depending on auth state.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Habits, Summary, and disabled Settings tabs, highlighting the active route with primary color and a dot indicator.
frontend/src/components/CheckInButton.ts: Circular 44px button that renders a green check for completed check-ins, a muted circle for past dates, or an interactive ring button (with spinner) for today's check-in via the useCheckIn mutation.
frontend/src/components/DateStrip.tsx: Horizontally scrollable week strip (Monâ€“Sun) that highlights today with a border and the selected date with a filled primary background, emitting the chosen date via onSelectDate.
frontend/src/components/FAB.tsx: Fixed circular floating action button positioned above the bottom nav that triggers an onClick callback to open the add-habit modal.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Renders a single habit card with check-in status, pastel styling, and a left-swipe-to-delete gesture that triggers the delete mutation with animation.
frontend/src/components/HabitForm.tsx: Form component for creating a new habit with name and optional description fields, using the useAddHabit mutation on submit.
frontend/src/components/HabitFormModal.t: Bottom-sheet modal wrapper around HabitForm for adding a new habit, closing the sheet on success.
frontend/src/components/HabitList.tsx: Fetches and renders the list of HabitCard components for a selected date, seeding default habits if none exist and showing a loading spinner otherwise.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell with a sticky header (logo + login button), main content outlet with bottom padding, an optional footer, and a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout and retrying login if already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Displays the current and longest check-in streaks for a habit using the useStreakCalculation hook.
frontend/src/components/WeeklySummary.ts: Shows a weekly stats dashboard with total check-ins, completion rate, active habit count, and a per-habit progress breakdown using useWeeklySummary.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDateCheckIn.ts: Utility hook that checks whether any check-in timestamp in a list falls within a given calendar day.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context (login, logout, identity, status) via AuthClient, with a React context provider and consumer hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, adding, checking in, and deleting habits via an ICP actor, plus a hook that auto-seeds a default 'Stretch & Move' habit when the user's habit list is empty.
Pure hook that computes the current and longest check-in streaks from an array of nanosecond timestamps, deduplicating same-day entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodayCheckIn.ts: Hook that returns a boolean indicating whether the last check-in timestamp falls within today's date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklySummary.ts: Hook that aggregates the past 7 days of check-ins across all habits, returning total check-ins, completion rate, and a per-habit breakdown.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, and adds pastel color and shadow utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/HabitsPage.tsx: Page component rendering a date strip, habit list for the selected date, and a FAB that opens the add-habit modal, all wrapped in an AuthGuard.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Page component that displays the WeeklySummary component inside an AuthGuard with a heading and description.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routes, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, font sizes, and OKLCH-based semantic color tokens (primary, success, pastel variants, etc.), with dark mode via class.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a habit tracker app with a known issue of habits not loading in the latest build and a registered fix feature request targeting useQueries.ts and HabitList.tsx.
